QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sat, 06 Nov 2021 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace won 2–0 over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sat, 06 Nov 2021 15:00:00 GMT.
